metadata.title: USN-5316-1 -- Redis vulnerability
metadata.description: Reginaldo Silva discovered that due to a packaging issue, a remote attacker with the ability to execute arbitrary Lua scripts could possibly escape the Lua sandbox and execute arbitrary code on the host.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5316-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  redis-sentinel - 5:5.0.7-2ubuntu0.1 redis-server - 5:5.0.7-2ubuntu0.1 redis - 5:5.0.7-2ubuntu0.1 redis-tools - 5:5.0.7-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
